title: Parental Advisory
description:
Andy Livengood, Julie Threlkeld, Jean LeBec, and Jon Gabrus all share tales of learning life lessons from their folks.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Four Tet, Andy Livengood, Beach House, Kevin Allison, Jon Gabrus, Jean LeBec, Primal Scream, Julie Threlkeld)
